import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import styled from "styled-components"; import { Container, Button, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; const PlayerAdder = ({ teamId, addFunc }) => { const [first, setFirst] = React.useState(""); const [last, setLast] = React.useState(""); const [posnum, setPos] = React.useState(0); const [weight, setWeight] = React.useState(0); const [height, setHeight] = React.useState(0); return (
setFirst(event.target.value)}> setLast(event.target.value)}>
); } export default PlayerAdder;
